00035 namespace ebl {
00036 
00037   template <class T, class L> 
00038   void supervised::train(LabeledDataSource<T, L> *ds, classifier_meter *mtr) {
00039     ds->seek_begin();
00040     mtr->clear();
00041   }
00042 
00043   template <class T, class L> 
00044   void supervised::test(LabeledDataSource<T, L> *ds, classifier_meter *mtr) {
00045     ds->seek_begin();
00046     mtr->clear();
00047     for (int i = 0; i < ds->size(); ++i) {
00048       ds->fprop(*input, *desired);
00049       machine->fprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00050       mtr->update(age, output, desired->get(), energy);
00051       ds->next();
00052     }
00053   }
00054

00056   void supervised::test_sample(LabeledDataSource<T, L> *ds, 
00057                                classifier_meter *mtr, intg i) {
00058     /*  ds->seek(i);
00059         ds->fprop(input, desired);
00060         machine->fprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00061         mtr->test(output, desired, energy);
00062     */  err_not_implemented();
00063   }

00067   template <class T, class L>  
00068   void supervised_gradient::train_online(LabeledDataSource<T, L> *ds, 
00069                                          classifier_meter *mtr,
00070                                          intg n, gd_param *gdp, 
00071                                          double kappa = 0.0) {
00072     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00073       ds->fprop(*input, *desired);
00074       machine->fprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00075       //   mtr->update(age, output, desired->get(), energy);
00076       param->clear_dx();
00077       machine->bprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00078       param->update_gd(*gdp);
00079       if (kappa != 0.0) {
00080         err_not_implemented();
00081         /*
00082           if (kappa > 0.0)
00083           param->update_xaverage(kappa);
00084           else if (kappa < 0.0)
00085           param->update_xaverage((-kappa) / (1 + age));
00086         */
00087       }
00088       age++;
00089       // info
00090       /*    cout << "age: " << age << " desired: " << (unsigned int) desired->get();
00091             cout << " output_class: " << (unsigned int) output->output_class << " machine->mout->x ";
00092             machine->mout->x.printElems();
00093             cout << endl;
00094       */    // (print (==> ds tell) (desired) :machine:mout:x)
00095       ds->next();
00096     }
00097     // mtr->info(); // TODO
00098   }
00099 
00100   template <class T, class L>  
00101   void supervised_gradient::train(LabeledDataSource<T, L> *ds, 
00102                                   classifier_meter *mtr, 
00103                                   gd_param *gdp, double kappa) {
00104     ds->seek_begin();
00105     mtr->clear();
00106     this->train_online(ds, mtr, ds->size(), gdp, kappa);
00107   }
00108 
00109   template <class T, class L>  
00110   void supervised_gradient::compute_diaghessian(LabeledDataSource<T, L> *ds, 
00111                                                 intg n, double mu) {
00112     param->clear_ddeltax();
00113     for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00114       ds->fprop(*input, *desired);
00115       machine->fprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00116       param->clear_dx();
00117       machine->bprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00118       param->clear_ddx();
00119       machine->bbprop(input, output, desired, energy);
00120       param->update_ddeltax((1 / (double) n), 1.0);
00121       ds->next();
00122     }
00123     param->compute_epsilons(mu);
00124     std::cout << "diaghessian inf: " << idx_min(param->epsilons);
00125     std::cout << " sup: " << idx_max(param->epsilons) << std::endl;
00126   }
